participant_1.background:
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
Where are you from?
I grew up in the deep south. How about you?
I moved to America when I was 14, and now I live in a big city.
That's interesting! What made you move to America?
My family needed to move there for work, and I've been here ever since.
Do you like living in a big city?
I like it, but I miss my hometown sometimes. I always go back to visit my parents.
That's understandable. I love my family too. I have four dogs, and they're like my children.
Aww, that's so cute! I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not allowed to have one in my apartment.
That's too bad! Dogs are great companions.
Yes, they are. I love watching dog videos on YouTube.
Me too! They're so funny.
What do you do for fun?
I like running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head. I also love drawing.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to play video games, and I'm in my last year of grad school.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying psychology.
That's cool! I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
Me too! I think it's really interesting to learn about why people do the things they do.
Yes, it is. I think it's important to be able to understand other people's perspectives.
I agree. It's the only way to really connect with them.
Exactly
